!!
1�PRODUCER'S DEBUG MENU...?@OPENING EVENTS.MISSIONS.WARP.SAW OPENING EVENT.CHEAT THE FAME GAME.RESET ALL??INITIALIZE.MissionEX.
1�Dat mithwa is a weally bad mithwa we all call da Cat Burglar.
1�He?`y, don't run so fasty-wasty!
1�Hmm... You call yourself an adventurrrer? I guess if one stretches her imagination enough, you could almost look like one.
1�What!? You won't pay me even a simple compliment, despite my kindly assistance!? Don't you know basic adventurrrer's etiquette?
1�You catch on quick, kid. I'm beginning to think I could like you.
1�This is the eastern gatehouse--a gathering place for the guards who do the rrrounds of Windurst Woods.
1�If you're after a map of Windurst, then head to the opening back up there. There's a Mithra merchant selling them there.
1�You cannot accept more than one mission at a time.
1�Please complete your current mission before applying for the next.
1�The missions we are currently able to offer you at the eastern gatehouse are as follows...
1�The missions we are currently able to offer you at the eastern gatehouse are as follows...

1�Which mission will you accept?The Horutoto Ruins Experiment.The Heart of the Matter.The Price of Peace.Lost for Words.A Testing Time.The Three Kingdoms.Mission 2-3-1A.Mission 2-3-1B.Mission 2-3-2A.Mission 2-3-2B.To Each His Own Right.Written in the Stars.A New Journey.Magicite.The Final Seal.The Shadow Awaits.Full Moon Fountain.Saintly Invitation.The Sixth Ministry.Awakening of the Gods.Vain.The Jester Who'd Be King.Doll of the Dead.Moon Reading.Dummy11.Dummy12.Dummy13.Dummy14.Dummy15.Dummy16.Dummy17.Decline mission.
1�Accept this mission?Yes.No.
1�Hear explanation of gatehouses?Hear! Hear!Turn a deaf ear.
1�Receive a mission?Accept.Decline.
1�The details of the mission will be explained when you meet with the Orastery's minister. I can't say he's the most pleasant of people, but at least he has guts.
1�Do us proud!
1�Good job!Glad to see you made it back alive! I trust the mission wasn't too dangerous.
1�Allocating rrrank points according to your efforts...has enabled you to go up to rrrank two! Congratulations!
1�Accept this mission?Accept.Decline.
1�I'm sure the Minister of the Manustery will fill you in on the details of your mission.
1�Cardians come in useful when you're after quantity over quality. Anyway, carry out your mission well--at least it'll help us keep the peace with our neighborhood ministry!
1�Grrr... Dammit!How long do we have to go on paying tribute to scavengers who could double-cross us at any time?
1�Anyway, you had better head on over to the Rrrhinostery in Windurst Waters, and pick up the food offering that the rrresearchers there have prepared for you to offer at Giddeus.
1�I suggest you try your hand at conquests now, as you'll need to gain more rrrank points before we can issue you further missions.
1�You can gain the rrrank points you need from participating in the rrregional conquests. Ask the War Warlock guard in charge of conquests over there for further information...
1�See you around.
1�I suggest you try your hand at conquests now, as you'll need to gain more rrrank points before we can issue you further missions.
1�Accept Mission?Accept.Decline.
1�The Library of Magic is northwest of here in Windurst Waters--the area furthest away from Windurst Woods.
1�The library lends out books if you're interested in them... Not that I've ever been there myself.
1�I hear they have a problem with people taking out books and never rrreturning them. Grrr... Those Tarutaru are such easy game!
1�Heavens Tower is north of here in Windurst Walls. You should have the details explained to you by the secretary there.
1�Semih Lafihna, eh?I don't know why, but I'm just not fond of that girl.
1�Anyway, get a move on to Heavens Tower. She's strict on herself and on others!
1�This mission has been issued by the head lady-in-waiting of Heavens Tower, Zubaba.
1�Not that I know much about her myself, but Zubaba has been serving as head lady-in-waiting since the current Star Sibyl was a child...

1�She's not a character you dare keep waiting. I rrrecommend you hurry on over to Heavens Tower. If you fulfill a mission from the head lady-in-waiting well enough, it's bound to improve your rrreputation.
1�This mission has been issued by the head lady-in-waiting, Zubaba.
1�Seems that they were impressed by your efforts in your previous mission. If you want to keep in their good books, I suggest you rrrush on over to Heavens Tower.
1�The head lady-in-waiting, Zubaba, is expecting you at Heavens Tower. Please proceed there immediately!
1�If you complete this mission well, it's bound to improve your rrreputation. Do a good job, you hear?
1�We have a formal writ of summons from Heavens Tower for you. One with a special star emblem on it signifies it is officially a mission of the utmost importance.
1�It rrreads that you,  , are to ??make yourself present at the Planetarium of Heavens Tower with precipitate haste.?? This is supposedly the greatest honor a citizen of Windurst can have.
1�For a formal writ of summons to be issued from Heavens Tower means an extremely important announcement will be made.
1�This also means you are no longer just a simple adventurer, my friend. Keep your wits about you! We'd like to escort you to your meeting, but alas, we are unable to rrright now.
1�You haven't heard?An emergency order has been issued to the guards and a select few adventurers deemed most loyal to Windurst.
1�The issuance of missions has been halted, pending further notice from Heavens Tower. Please stand by until then.
1�You haven't heard?An emergency order has been issued to the guards and a select few adventurers deemed most loyal to Windurst.
1�The issuance of missions has been halted pending further notice from Heavens Tower. Please stand by until then.
1�An emergency mission addressed to you has been issued once again from Heavens Tower.
1�You had better hurry to Heavens Tower and rrreceive your exact orders there. Seems as though you shall be traveling to the ends of Vana'diel.
1�The ancient rrruins of Fei'Yin...? I thought it was just the subject of fairy tales...
1�Have you rrreceived your exact orders yet? If not, then you had better hurry on over to Heavens Tower to rrreceive them. Sounds like you'll be traveling to the ends of Vana'diel.
1�The ancient rrruins of Fei'Yin...? I thought it was just the stuff of fairy tales...
1�I just rrreceived word that the conference of ministers has ended.
1�Together with that announcement came another 3???? addressed to you. You had better rrrush on over to Heavens Tower again.
1�I've rrreceived word that the conference of ministers has ended.
1�Together with that announcement came 6???? addressed to you. You had better rrrush to Heavens Tower.
1�Accept the mission?Accept.Decline.
1�The Aurastery's School of Magic is on the eastern side of Windurst Waters. Just head north from Windurst Waters's rrresidential area entrance.
1�The school is full of children striving to become tomorrow's politicians and scholars. Putting up with them is a greater test of endurance than any mission I can issue you!
1�How arrre you?`?I'm fine, as always...I think.
1�We've been having a spot of trouble because of those Yagudo beastmen, but Captain Rakoh Buuma's on hand, so things are underrr control...I think.

1�He?`y, you seem to be from another country...I think. If you'rrre looking for the Consulate of  [San d'Oria/Bastok], then it's  [in this area/west of here]... [across the Bomingo Round/in Port Windurst].
1�That Meeri-Wohri is a clumsy little nerrrvous wreck, y'know?
1�One day, I awoke from a cat nap wherrre I was having this dream about eating a Mithkabob, only to find I was chewing on the little guy's leg! I hope I didn't hurrrt him...to?`o much.
1�You'rrre not s'posed to go straight to them magical towers, y'know? You'rrre s'posed to go to the O?`rastery first...I think.
1�The Orastery is in charge of the Mage Academy, y'know? That's where the Tarutaru practice their spells all day in order to perrrfect them. It's the big building in the port area...I think.
1�Missions are all verrry well and good, but you should also try some quests too...I think!
1�Speaking to the townsfolk and trrrying to help them with their problems... It can be very beneficial, y'know!
1�Go right down that road therrre, and when you come out into the round, you'll see a larrrge building up on your right...I think. Well, that's the Manustery's Cardian workshop, y'know?
1�To find the entrances to the building, you may have to walk around the place a bit. But it's not enough to get you lost or anything...well, at least that's what I think.
1�I just don't underrrstand why the Tarutaru fear those Yagudo.
1�Like, wasn't it because of that old Shadow Lorrrd that they nearly lost the war twenty years ago?
1�With him dead and burrried, even if we were to have an all-out war with the Yagudo, we'd still come out on top...I think.
1�Grrr... You went ahead and fulfilled that mission, huh? That means we gave the lazy Yagudo nourrrishment to make them stronger...I think.
1�Captain Rakoh Buuma also disagrrrees with the Star Sibyl on this, y'know? We should just rrrefuse to hand out this mission from now on...I think.
1�You'rrre going to the library, huh? That reminds me...I have a book overdue there...I think.
1�What? You want to know what book I borrrrowed? Well, I'm not telling, so there!
1�(Don't ask me what book I took out. It's not like I actually read them... They'rrre way over my reading age.)
1�Once you accept this mission, you won't be coming back here any time soon, y'know.And just when I was almost getting to like you...I think.
1�Oh, so look who gets to meet Semih Lafihna...
1�Everyone always arrrgues over who's the better archer, Captain Rakoh Buuma or Semih Lafihna, y'know. But Captain Buuma is the best, of courrrse...well, at least that's what I think.
1�Tarutaru girls all want to become ladies-in-waiting, y'know? Like, what's wrrrong with them?
1�Perrrhaps it's similar to how little Mithra girls go through a stage where they all want to grow up to become Huntresses of the Sun...I think.
1�What's going on?What's this starrr emblem thingo?I don't underrrstand...I think.
1�Miiri-Wohri's been carrying on all excitedly there by himself, y'know? I don't get it at all!
1�Did you hearrr? Did you hearrr? Captain Rakoh Buuma was called to the Mage Academy, y'know?
1�It's an emergency situation, so the captains of each of the fourrr guardhouses were asked to assemble. Sounds like they had a secrrret meeting or something...I think.
1�What does our trrribal leader think of all this...I wonder?

1�When the emergency situation arrrose, did the Star Sibyl inform our tribal leader? ...I don't know. I hope Heavens Tower didn't give our tribal leader the cold shoulder. I'd never forrrgive them for that!
1�It's extrrremely rare for the five ministries to suddenly hold a meeting, y'know?
1�It's prrractically impossible to gather the ministers of the five ministries together, so they usually announce these things months in advance...I think.
1�The ministerrr of the Orastery just went out through that gate, y'know?
1�Maybe it has something to do with that starrr emblem letter from Heavens Tower...I think? I wonderrr what is written in those letters?
1�Come to think of it...therrre is a Mithra girl in the advanced class of the School of Magic, y'know?
1�She's the firrrst Mithra to make it into the advanced class...y'know? Someone should give herrr a pat on the back, I think.
1�Where did she hear about it, I wonder...?Semih Lafihna, she like, totally wanted to know everything about this mission from Ajido-Marujido.
1�She seemed kinda on edge, y'know?Even Captain Buuma, who like, totally hates Semih, was like, ??Oh, okay, this is what the mission is about,??...or something like that.
1�I always thought Heavens Tower just did, y'know, prophecies and stuff. But the Star Sibyl rrreally, like, lays down the law when she has to.
1�What did the Orastery minister get up to, anyway? I mean, what's under that crumbly old tower, like, y'know?
1�You know the Minister of the Manustery...Miss Apururu? She doesn't like, y'know, smile as much as she used to.
1�Even when she does smile, it's like, not rrreally a smile, y'know? I'm a girrrl, too. I know these things... I think.
1�Have you ever been to the southern continent?There are lots of, like, rrreally rrrare plants and stuff... I think.
1�We use those plants to make, y'know, medicine and weapons and stuff like that.We Mithra are, like, children of nature, y'know?
1�The Principal of the School of Magic is Professor Koru-Moru, y'know? But, like, a few years back, there was a different guy doing the job, y'know?
1�What's really weird is that you don't hear anything about that guy. Tarutaru are, like, totally into their rumors, so I thought it was kinda strange.
1�Miiri-Wohri is, like, totally freaked about this mission.
1�But even if we, like, y'know, get found out and stuff, they'll just throw us all into the dungeon for a couple of days. It'll be like a sleepover!
1�Captain Rakoh Buuma was sooo angrrry, y'know? She was saying something like, ??Lately the guards of Windurst Woods have rrreally been slacking off! Slacking off completely!??...I think.
1�Now that the airship route to the southern continent has been reopened, there might be some trrrouble amongst the Mithra of Windurst...I think....Gotta stay alert, y'know?
1�Heavens Tower is gonna, like, totally notice that the Dark Dungeon is empty at any time now.
1�We Mithra are born with, you know, a sixth sense and stuff. You can bet that Semih Lafihna's tail is totally twitching right now.
1�Even though you, like, totally trrrashed the beastmen's boss guy, the Yagudo still act like they're tougher than us.
1�Something fishy's going on. It's like, the Yagudo are prrreying on our weaknesses...or something like that. You're, y'know, all important and stuff, so you should know what's going on, rrright?
1�I just saw Ajido-Marujido leaving the Manustery in, like, full view...
1�Should he be, y'know, walking around outside and stuff? Shouldn't he be using, like, some sorta invisibility spell thingy?
1�It could be just my imagination, but I feel like, y'know, all the Mithra in Windurst have finally become united in spirrrit.
1�I also feel that we've become, like, buddies with all the little Tarutaru. And you, of course,  . You're, like, my hero!
1�What are you staring at? Haven't you ever seen a Mithra beforrre?
1�Here in Windurst Woods, there arrre many Mithra. You'll soon get over it...
1�This is Windurst Woods, the Mithra part of town! We Mithra have to stick together, so feel welcome, frrriend!
1�This is the easterrrn gatehouse.Feel free to ask Captain Rakoh Buuma whenever you need a helping paw from Buuma's Boomerrrs! She's the grrreatest!
1�The Horutoto Ruins are a bunch of old towerrrs out in Sarutabaruta.
1�But they're all falling to pieces now...It was the Tarutaru who destrrroyed them. They insist it was all due to the Great Warrr, but that just sounds like halfling half-truths to me.
1�Did you enjoy your little run-in with the ministerrr of the Orastery? Grrr... Oh, and were you able to meet his little sisterrr?
1�The Minister of the Orastery's sisterrr is named Apururu. You'd know if you met herrr. She's also the ministerrr of the Manustery.
1�Compared to us, Carrrdians are useless. They have no sense when it comes to fighting.
1�However, I'll say this about them...they have no fearrr of death. Even we Mithra aren't as darrring as they are. That could be a powerrrful advantage...
1�It's not like we're mindlessly opposed to a frrriendship pact with the Yagudo.
1�Those Yagudo don't keep their side of the barrrgain. We have the old saying of ??never share a meal with those who do not keep their prrromises.??
1�Even though you got promoted to rank two, you're still an underrrling. But don't be disappointed...
1�Underlings can get out of work without otherrr people complaining much. And you can also secretly eat some snacks too, if you're carrreful.
1�I've borrowed books from the Librarrry of Magic too, you know.
1�One time I took a book home to read, and as soon as I opened it a whole army of frrrogs came jumping out at me!
1�I borrowed as many books as I could following that, but never had a single frog pop out at me. Too bad, as they were really tasty frrrogs, too!
1�Once you go to another countrrry, you'll realize just how good old Windurst is.
1�The food is great, you can cat nap as much as you like, and turning up late is the norrrm. Everyone takes life easy herrre.
1�Sibyl Guards aren't loved by the Mithra as a whole verrry much. We don't like people who take on fancy titles and think they're betterrr than the rest of the tribe.
1�What's more, that Semih Lafihna is so serrrious and hard worrrking, her tail is so slim and shiny, and she's also such a know-it-all. Doesn't she just make you jealous?
1�I hear there are many ladies-in-waiting who serve the Star Sibyl on the second floorrr of Heavens Tower.
1�Sounds as though they do all the cleaning, washing and cooking there. Grrr...
1�I don't see how anyone can get so excited about a piece of paper. Paperrr's something that even goats eat.Totally worrrthless!
1�...Actually, I'm only saying that 'cause I'm jealous. I wish I got one of them wrrrits too! That's so cool! You're so lucky!
1�Seems like something bad happened in the central towerrr of the Horutoto Ruins.
1�Semih Lafihna, the Sibyl Guard, had a black look on herrr face as she ran by here en route to the Horutoto Ruins. Then she came back a little while ago looking even angrierrr!
1�The talisman that disappeared from the Horutoto Ruins was supposed to have been separated between the three countrrries.
1�Windurst notified the other two countries immediately, so theirrr talismans should be safe. I'm sure they'll up the guard once they've hearrrd what happened.
1�The situation took a turn for the worrrse there, but it seems all-out warfarrre has been avoided.
1�Oops...but that was meant to be a secrrret. We're not allowed to tell people about you-know-who being resurrrrected, or how war was about to break out... It would be widespread panic.
1�The situation took a turn for the worrrse there, but it seems all-out warfarrre has been avoided.
1�Oops...but that was meant to be a secrrret. We're not allowed to tell people about you-know-who being resurrrrected, or how war was about to break out... It would be widespread panic.
1�Why would Tarutaru children everrr want to study at a School of Magic?
1�Grrr... I'd hate to be forrrced to sit in front of a desk all day. It sounds like a punishment to me.
1�Things are so easygoing herrre lately.It's nice to have some peace in Windurst for a change.
1�Up until now there have been so many heart-stopping incidents. Farrr too many. We should try and preserve this peace for a while.
1�What an uproarrr!There's been anotherrr incident!
1�...But being a Tarutaru problem, it's probably nothing to get worked up about. He'll just get a slap on the wrist and a week in jail or something similarrr, I would think.
1�I despise cleaning, but I love those frog books.
1�If I were a rank seven adventurerrr being offered this mission... Rrr, what a dilemma!
1�We Mithra came to Windurst from a village far to the south.
1�...I don't really rememberrr much about it, though. Just that it was always hot.
1�What do I mean,  [50/60/70/80/90/100] points?Ah, now that would be telling!
1�Things are getting exciting now! All the guards arrre in on this secret together!
1�I can hardly contain myself! But I won't let on to anyone. I'll just flick my tail and keep it in.
1�Captain Rakoh Buuma has been fuming that the guards of Windurst Woods have ??rrreally been slacking off, slacking off completely??!
1�I wonderrr if she found out about me fishing during patrol duty? I'm not gonna fish anymorrre! I'm gonna do my job properly!
1�F...f...froggies!
1�Meow!
1�These Tarutaru sure can be a vicious little bunch.
1�We Mithra would neverrr leave someone anguishing in torment like that. Those who transgress against Mithran law are cut down cleanly and face-to-face by the Mithran Trackerrr.
1�Captain Buuma was saying that our work might dry up completely after this next mission. If that happens, I'm gonna go hungry.
1�That's why I've started fishing again. I bought the most amazing fishing rod! It was so nice of Miiri-Wohri to lend me the money!
1�Captain Buuma said something that really upset me...! I'm in such a state, my furrr is starting to fall out...!
1�Fishing is fun, but I'm a Windurst Woods guard first and foremost! The safety of this city is my top priority!
1�Oh, and by the way, I finally learned your name. You're  , right?
1�I, I, erm, am one of the guards here.<gulp>...Well, erm, nice to meety-weety you!
1�I, I'm still getting used to it, erm, here... But I'm trying-wrying my besty!
1�The, the Hume guys all say they envy-wenvy me, you know, being surrounded by Mithra ladies all day and everything... B-but, to tell you the truth, I get really tired-wired, day in and day out.
1�The, the Mithra ladies are normally very p-pleasant and ch-cheery, but you've got to keep on your toesy-woesies!
1�Once, I, erm, nodded off for a bit, and, and, woke up to find bite marks on my leggy-leg-legs! I, I, erm, don't want to be eatened!!!
1�O-only the e-elite students from the School of Magic can go on to enter the Orastery. So, so the Tarutaru in the Orastery are the most brilliant magic users in the whole of Windurst!
1�C-Cardians were invented to fight as magical puppet-like s-soldiers in the Great War of twenty-wenty years ago.
1�Th-thanks to the creation of the Cardians, Tarutaru and Mithra guards have come to suffer less injuries.
1�I, I understand totally-wotally what the Star Sibyl is saying...
1�The Star Sibyl is thinking first and foremost of the safety of us Windurstians.
1�W-well done!I knew you could do it. I, I hope you didn't get hurty-wurty.
1�If only those Yagudo would let down their guardy-wuardy a bit, we wouldn't have to go through all that just to give them their offerings.
1�Th-the Library of Magic isn't magic in name only. Almost all the books there have some sort of enchantment-bechantment cast upon them.
1�W-when you check a book out, the librarians temporarily remove the magic for safety's sake. But, but, sometimes they've been known to forget, so be careful!
1�Gee... I, I wish I could join in this mission-wission too!
1�B-but I'm too scared to ask Sola Jaab, in, in case she literally b-bites my heady-weady off!
1�S-Sibyl G-Guards are the Mithra fighter-mighters who, who serve and protect the great Star Sibyl.
1�M-most of the M-Mithra in Windurst serve their tribal chieftainness. So you see...Sibyl Guards are special-wecial, even in the Mithran society.
1�A, a mission from Z-Z-Zubaba!?
1�Wow! You mean, Zubaba's still alivey-wivey?Gee...
1�I-It's the first time I saw the real thing! I was the one who took the delivery of your writ...so I was able to touch it!
1�Wow! It's, it's, it's like I touched the hand of the Star Sibyl...only indirectly! Woooo! I'm sooo happy to be alivey-wivey!
1�My! W-Windurst is in a state of emergency... I, I just hope nothing has happened to our blessed-wessed Star Sibyl!
1�If, if anything were to happen to her, Windurst would be ruined! It's b-beyond the depths of despairy-wairy!
1�It, it seems as though the Star Sibyl and her ladies-in-waiting are all safe and soundy-woundy.
1�B-but I heard that some rogue broke into the Horutoto Ruins. Wasn't the talisman from the Great War of twenty years ago stored there...?
1�I, I heard all sorts of nasty rumors about the meeting of the five ministries, but according to the fortune read by the Star Sibyl, Windurst's future is meant to be bright.
1�So, so there's no need to worry.There's no way a war will break out.You, you can take my word for it!
1�I, I had the pleasure of delivering a, a star emblem letter from Heavens Tower to the Minister of the Manustery, Miss Apururu.
1�M-Miss Apururu was so pleased, she let slip a little about what's been going on.

1�What would you like to ask about?The Vana'diel Chocobo Society.Time required.Chocobo attributes.Care schedule.Caring for your chocobo.Feed.Abilities and personality.Retirement.Matchmaking.Calling chocobos in the field.Items.Lost chicks.Nothing.

1�The Vana'diel Chocobo Society, or VCS for short, is an international organization designed to train and dispatch chocogirls and chocoguys to stables across Vana'diel.
1�They provide courses on practical chocobo riding and the proper ways to care for a chocobo, as well as working to improve the treatment of chocobos from here to Aht Urhgan.
1�Anyone can join as long as they love chocobos. The VCS will help you with anything you need.
1�Chicks hatch from eggs, grow into young chocobos, and finally mature.
1�They grow much faster than people do. Usually it takes about 1 month (Earth time) before you can ride your chocobo.
1�The chocobo's traits are determined by the way in which you care for your animal. Without proper planning, you won't be able to raise the type of chocobo that you want.
1�But don't worry, because you have us to help! We're all in this together!
1�Ask about which attribute?Strength.Endurance.Discernment.Receptivity.Energy.Affection.Satisfaction.Nothing.

1�??Strength?? is a term used to describe the chocobo's leg power. The more strength a chocobo has, the faster it will be able to run. Rental chocobos have been raised with an emphasis on this attribute.
1�Both strength and endurance are collectively referred to as ??Physical attributes.??
1�??Endurance?? is a term used to describe the chocobo's stamina. If your chocobo has high endurance, you will be able to ride it for a long period of time.
1�Both strength and endurance are collectively referred to as ??Physical attributes.??
1�??Discernment?? is a must for anyone who wants their chocobo to learn new abilities. You may want to consider raising this attribute if you are interested in digging for treasure.
1�Both discernment and receptivity are collectively referred to as ??Mental attributes.??

1�??Receptivity?? is a term used to describe the chocobo's sensitivity when dealing with others. You can foster receptivity in your chocobo by giving it lots of opportunities to communicate with other chocobos.
1�Both discernment and receptivity are collectively referred to as ??Mental attributes.??

1�??Energy?? is a term used to describe the amount of power the chocobo needs to stay active for the day. If your chocobo has a lot of energy, care plans are more likely to be successful and you can provide more direct care for your chocobo.
1�You can restore your chocobo's energy by feeding it, so remember not to skip out on feeding time after a demanding schedule!
1�??Affection?? is the most important attribute of all. Your care schedule will fall flat if you don't show your chocobo proper affection!
1�You can raise your chocobo's affection by feeding it greens and caring for it on a regular basis.
1�If you really want to raise your chocobo's affection quickly, you can give it  $????, but I can't recommend doing so unless absolutely necessary.
1�??Satisfaction?? is a term used to describe how full or hungry your chocobo is. If your chocobo is full, it will gain a lot of energy before the next day.
1�However, when the chocobo is very hungry, its energy will hardly recover at all and its affection will rapidly decrease.

1�What would you like to ask about?What is a care schedule?Basic care.Resting.Taking a walk.Listening to music.Exercising alone.Exercising in a group.Interacting with children.Interacting with chocobos.Carrying packages.Exhibiting to the public.Delivering messages.Digging for treasure.Acting in a play.Nothing.
1�A care schedule is a series of plans that you set up for your chocobo so that we can take care of it while you are away.
1�How you want us to care for your chocobo each day is completely up to you.
1�You can register up to four plans at once, each for up to 7 days (Earth time).
1�When you come to check on your chocobo, we will give you a report on the results. You should listen closely to the report and use it as reference when deciding on a new schedule.
1�With the basic care plan, we will provide the minimum level of care for your chocobo. This plan is the most stable, and your chocobo will probably not experience any sudden changes.
1�The basic care plan is good for those who don't want their chocobo's traits to change much or are still unsure of what kind of schedule to choose.
1�You can select the basic care plan the moment you start raising your chocobo.
1�The rest plan's name speaks for itself. We will give your chocobo a rest in order to restore its energy and cure any status abnormalities.
1�However, your chocobo will not be able to eat any food you give it during the plan, because it will be in a deep sleep.

1�We can take your chocobo for a walk in town to improve its physical attributes of strength and endurance. However, it will have a negative effect on its mental attributes of discernment and receptivity.
1�Listening to music will improve your chocobo's mental attributes of discernment and receptivity. However, it will have a negative effect on its physical attributes of strength and endurance.
1�Exercising alone will significantly improve your chocobo's strength. On the other hand, its mental attributes will markedly decrease.
1�If the chocobo is strong, this plan is quite effective, but if the chocobo is weak, then you shouldn't push it too hard.
1�Exercising with chocobos will build your animal's endurance. On the other hand, its mental attributes will decrease.
1�If the chocobo has high endurance, this plan is quite effective, but if the chocobo's endurance is low, then you shouldn't push it too hard.
1�Interacting with children helps your chocobo become a more discerning creature by interacting with people.
1�However, this plan will have a negative effect on the chocobo's physical attributes, as no strenuous exercise is involved.
1�If the chocobo has good discernment, this plan is quite effective, but if the chocobo does not have good discernment, then you shouldn't push it too hard.
1�Interacting with other chocobos in the field will improve the chocobo's receptivity by fostering its communication skills.
1�But because the focus is on communication and not exercise, this plan will have a negative effect on the chocobo's physical attributes.
1�If the chocobo has good receptivity, this plan is quite effective, but if the chocobo does not have good receptivity, then you shouldn't push it too hard.
1�You can choose to have your chocobo help deliver packages. Not only will this improve its physical attributes, but you will even receive payment for your services!
1�The downside is that your chocobo's mental attributes, energy, and affection will decrease. You must care well for your chocobo, or you might find yourself getting cold treatment.

1�You can choose to exhibit your chocobo to the public, which will allow anyone visiting the chocobo stables to take a look at your animal. Being the center of attention will help improve your chocobo's mental attributes.
1�The downside is that your chocobo's physical attributes, energy, and affection will decrease. You must care well for your chocobo afterwards. Also, you will receive payment for this service.
1�You can choose to have your chocobo deliver official messages for the nation. Not only will this improve its strength, but you will even receive payment for your services!
1�However, this plan consumes quite a bit of your chocobo's energy, so you should feed it well to make up for it.
1�You can have your chocobo help out VCS finances by digging for treasure. This will also improve the chocobo's discernment.
1�The VCS will sell the item and use the money for the organization's benefit, but will provide you with payment for your services.
1�However, this plan consumes quite a bit of your chocobo's energy, so you should feed it well to make up for it.
1�You can choose to have your chocobo act as an extra in a play to improve its receptivity.
1�You will receive payment in accordance with the chocobo's performance. However, this plan consumes quite a bit of your chocobo's energy, so you should feed it well to make up for it.
1�What would you like to ask about?A general explanation.Watching over your chocobo.Telling a story.Scolding.Competing.Taking a walk.Nothing.
1�In addition to setting the chocobo's schedule, you can also care directly for your chocobo whenever you like.
1�Caring for your chocobo will increase its affection for you.
1�On the other hand, a chocobo that receives too much care will lose energy more rapidly when engaging in activities. If you do nothing but care for your chocobo, it will become fatigued.
1�However, not caring enough for your chocobo will have a negative effect on your relationship, so it is important to find a balance.
1�You can watch over your chocobo whenever you like.
1�Your fond gaze can communicate even more than a touch and will not have a very tiring effect on the animal.
1�You can tell the chocobo a story you know. This will foster the animal's sensibilities.
1�I've heard that by listening to the story, the chocobo might even realize it has powers it never noticed before. (I've never seen it happen before, though...)
1�Sometimes your chocobo might start acting spoiled or refuse to do anything but sleep. In such times, you will need to firmly scold it.
1�This will shame the animal and have an effect on its receptivity.
1�Competing against other chocobos will cultivate your animal's ambitious spirit and is highly effective for bored chocobos.
1�You can take your chocobo out for a walk in the field. You will be able to choose more destinations as your chocobo grows.
1�I like to take the chocobo out often, too, but I'm sure it prefers going out with you.
1�Leaving the stables every once in a while allows your chocobo to experience new sights and sounds. Maybe you'll even discover something new together!
1�What would you like to know about?Why feeding is important.Vegetables.Wildgrasses.Carrots.Worms.Medicines.Pastes.Nothing.
1�Chocobos digest feed quickly, so they are often hungry.
1�However, they also restore energy at a rapid pace. If you do not feed your chocobo properly, it will be unable to restore enough energy.
1�The chocobo stables will provide your chocobo with the minimum amount of feed required for the animal to survive, but you need to provide more in order to ensure its healthy growth.
1�At the same time, feeding your chocobo too much can result in a stomachache. Remember to strike a balance with both the variety and quantity of feed you give to your animal!
1�Some types of feed have special effects, so it is important not to neglect your chocobo's diet if you want to raise a good chocobo.
1�There are different methods of acquiring these special types of feed, so be on the lookout for them!
1�Just trade the feed to an advanced chocobo trainer, and they will give it to your chocobo.

1�All three nations are striving daily to put more regions under their control. This is what we call ??conquests.?? You can take part in it and serve your country by defeating enemies while you have Signet cast on you.
1�Each region comprises several areas, and the nation that rids those areas of the most monsters gains control of the region.
1�Nations receive goods and resources from regions under their control.
1�So, the more regions we control, the richer our nation becomes.
1�Border guards are also placed in outposts within regions under our control.They are there to cast Signet on adventurers like yourself.

1�Not only that, but you will also receive conquest points. You get more conquest points if you defeat enemies in regions that are not under your nation's control. These points can be used to purchase items from guards like myself.

1�Venture roll is a competitive game played with dice similar to those used by corsairs. The objective is to roll until your cumulative total comes as close to 11 as possible without going over.

1�Until you reach or go over 11, you may continue rolling (doubling up) as many times as the table time limit allows (
  ? [minute/minutes], Earth time).
1�In addition to doubling up, you may also decline to roll the dice and stay with your current total (hold fast).
1�If your total ever goes over 11, you will automatically lose the game, regardless of the totals of other players. Knowing the right time to hold fast is one of the keys to staying in the match.

1�Once all the players have held fast, the game is over and the results are announced. The player closest to 11 is declared the winner and receives all the gil in the pot (the original participation fees of all the players).
1�Objective: Roll a six-sided die as many times as necessary to achieve a total as close to 11 as possible. You lose the instant your total exceeds 11.
1�If two or more players are the closest to 11 at the end of a match, the game is considered a draw and all participation fees are repaid in full.
1�Once the game has started, fees will not be refunded for any reason unless the match results in a draw.

1�I am Zahsa Syalmhaia, captain of the mercenaries in charge of defending East Sarutabaruta.
1�And now, a question for you, adventurer--do you know of the stone maws being found across the land? Some might describe them as ??cavernous.??
1�Hmph! Then I shall enlighten you.They are large statues of hideous visage, and have been around for some time. These maws are more than they appear, I guarantee you.
1�Greetings and well met! Protector of the Federation, Selele, at your most humble service.

1�My station is to help along those new to the life of an adventurer in Vana'diel.I specialize in the types of fundamental knowledge necessary for success in such endeavors, as well as related methods of pedagogy.With my aid, you can rest assured that your first steps down the adventurer's path will not go astray.
1�Should you still consider yourself a newcomer, I would highly recommend that you make full use of my services.
1�This is my permanent post, and I never leave it. Remember it well.Whenever you need a hand with anything, anything at all, don't hesitate to come calling.
1�So, are you interested in some entry-level duties to put you well on your way to greatness?Not to worry, I've got just the thing for you!
1�Go talk to the guard Harara over yonder and have her cast ??Signet?? on you. Then come back and see me.
1�Go talk to the guard Harara over yonder and have her cast ??Signet?? on you. Then come back and see me.
1�Well, it looks like you were able to get your Signet. Easy enough, yes?

1�As long as Signet is in effect, there is always a possibility that you will obtain crystals from any enemies that you defeat.There are also other more concrete benefits, such as increased defense and evasion.

1�Signet even helps you when not engaged in combat with an enemy. For example, it boosts the rate at which healing occurs while at rest.For all of these reasons and more, you should consider it essential to have Signet cast on you at all times.
1�Very well, then! As a reward for successful completion of your first assignment I would like to present you with these %????.

1�There is more here than ??meats?? the eye! That was a joke...Anyway, this is a type of item known amongst adventurers as a ??meal.??This meal in particular will temporarily enhance your attack power when eaten.
1�Whenever any type of meal is consumed, you will receive some such temporary status bonus.Naturally, different meals grant different types of bonuses.
1�For the most part, meat dishes will affect attack power.Conversely, seafood dishes generally enhance defense, and so on and so forth.Take care to select dishes best suited to your purpose.
1�One thing you should make note of, however, is that you cannot eat a meal while another meal's status bonus is still in effect.Your stomach would simply burst!
1�Hmmm, that's quite a lot to cover...Are you with me so far?

1�Next, let's get those pristine hands of yours nice and dirty!No sense in letting that food go to waste now, is there? Let's send you out to fight a monster on a full stomach!

1�It's high time you learned how to use a ??weapon skill??!

1�Unity Concord is a system promulgated and managed by the Adventurers' Mutual Aid Network.
1�Participating adventurers are able to receive a variety of benefits and rewards just by engaging in their everyday activities.
1�??Unity?? is a catchall term that refers to the group that participants belong to.
1�Unity leaders are individuals who have strong ties to adventurers' activities and are sterling representatives of their home nations.
1�Members of the same Unity can converse with each other over great distances through the use of specialized figurines known as ??5????.??
1�Chat settings may be changed by selecting ??Status?? from the main menu, and choosing ??Unity Info?? under the ??Unity?? submenu.
1�You may not always be able to join the chat if too many players are participating at once.
1�Those belonging to a Unity are able to undertake special Records of Eminence objectives related to Unity Concord activities.
1�The three pertinent categories include shared objectives, Unity leader-specific objectives, and Wanted battle objectives.
1�Shared objectives may be taken regardless of which Unity you have joined. These tasks can be undertaken at any time, and change every day at midnight (JST).
1�Unity leader-specific objectives are tied to the Unity's eponymous leader and change each week.
1�??Wanted?? objectives center around vanquishing particularly heinous foes that terrorize Vana'diel.
1�These objectives are of a higher caliber, and thus require currency known as ??Unity accolades?? to undertake.
1�Shared and leader-specific objectives provide more accolades than run-of-the-mill objectives.
1�Vana'diel has always been plagued by nefarious foes pillaging the landscape, but relatives of some of the more heinous ones have been spotted lately.
1�The A.M.A.N. has deemed it necessary to eliminate these Wanted targets, and has notified Unity members that they are of the utmost priority.
1�A list of these foes can be viewed at any time by selecting the appropriate subcategory under the objectives list.
1�Unity Concord representatives are able to provide participants with transportation to the areas where these threats can be found.
1�Though tackling the profane will likely require participation of your allies, the objective can be undertaken so long as at least one person has set the appropriate objective.
1�When you set the objective and commence the battle, the requisite number of Unity accolades will be deducted from your total.
1�Successful challengers will be rewarded with special rewards in addition to the normal sparks of eminence.
1�No Unity accolades will be charged should you commence the battle without having the appropriate objective set, but the rewards you can reap from your efforts will be limited.
1�You can snatch unparalleled equipment and materials from the slain corpses of Wanted targets.
1�An A.M.A.N. specialist versed in arcane harmonization has kindly offered to use these materials to bring out the latent potential in such pieces.
1�One of the Unity guides will be pleased to accept certain combinations of equipment and materials to begin the process for you.
1�A number of accolades is required for this service, but the precision and accuracy of her methods are without equal, and there is no worry of your equipment being destroyed.
1�Completing Records of Eminence objectives as part of a Unity will reward you with Unity accolades in addition to sparks of eminence.
1�These accolades not only serve as a symbol of prestige, but can also be exchanged for a variety of services.
1�Some of these services include purchasing items, securing battle zones for hunting Wanted targets, fees for strengthening equipment, and more.
1�You may switch Unities once during the Unity ranking tabulation period.
1�This is not a decision to be taken lightly, for switching Unities will cause you to forfeit any benefits you were receiving from your previous one.
1�This process requires a fair deal of paperwork, and the A.M.A.N. will charge you an accolade fee based on your rank.
1�However, your valorous deeds remain wherever you choose to go, and you will not lose any other accolades.
1�Rankings are decided through the combined efforts of each of the Unity's members.
1�The A.M.A.N. tabulates all the good deeds done during a period of time and confers benefits on a Unity for the following ranking period.
1�Some of these benefits include changes to Unity accolades gained and the effects of equipment earned from Wanted battles.
1�Yes, you read that correctly--the attributes of certain equipment will increase in line with your Unity's ranking.
1�On the other hand, members of a Unity that finds itself on the lower rungs will enjoy an increase in accolades and capacity points earned to help bring them up to par.

1�Additionally, an individual's evaluation is the sum of the accolades they have earned divided by
